person.description: Good decisions come from experience... that's what Bartek believes in. Since 2005, his major field is a User Experience. He always looks for improvements - to help World become a better place. In addition to UX he is a talented graphic designer with perfect HTML & CSS skills, and a Rails-lover. Bartek's skills are appreciated by companies in Poland, England and Germany. He's currently working at Line Communications.
person.meta_title: Bartek Widłak - Ruby on Rails developer
